snippet: In a recap of the 50-day war in Gaza, Israel says that it killed several hundred militants, and that militant groups operating in Gaza still have as many as 3,000 rockets on hand.
abstract: Israel says that it has killed several hundred Hamas militants during 50-day war in Gaza, and that militants still have as many as 3,000 rockets on hand.
lead_paragraph: In a recap of the 50-day war in Gaza, Israel says that it killed several hundred militants, and that militant groups operating in Gaza still have as many as 3,000 rockets on hand.

headline.main: Israel Says Hamas Is Hurt Significantly
headline.print_headline: Israel Says Hamas Is Hurt Significantly
